clientId.title: Client ID
clientId.description: In Workday, register an integrations API client with Person and Staffing as its scope. Obtain the Client ID, Client Secret, and Refresh Token values.

clientSecret.title: Client Secret
clientSecret.description: In Workday, register an integrations API client with Person and Staffing as its scope. Obtain the Client ID, Client Secret, and Refresh Token values.

refreshToken.title: Refresh Token
refreshToken.description: In Workday, register an integrations API client with Person and Staffing as its scope. Obtain the Client ID, Client Secret, and Refresh Token values.

baseUrl.title: REST/Auth API base URL
baseUrl.description: Workday REST/Auth API base URL. For example if your Workday REST API endpoint URL is 'https://wd2-impl-services1.workday.com/ccx/api/v2/{tenantName}' then strip 'api/v2/{tenantName}' and just paste 'https://wd2-impl-services1.workday.com/ccx/'.

limit.title: Page Limit
limit.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response.

custom_report_path.title: Custom Report Path
custom_report_path.description: Path to a Custom Report which the API will call, e.g. /acme/My_Custom_Report
